name: FishHead (lholzen)
description:
FishHead

FishHead is a small game about a sewer worker that has to fight holes in the ground. Shoot cones with your Cone Pistol™ and let that pesky hole choke on all the stuff it swallowed! 

This games was made for the "Game Visuals 4" module at ZHdK.

Play with Gamepad.

Install Instructions

Unzip the folder, then run the .exe inside the folder that shipped with it.

Known Issues
  • Selection via gamepad fails when clicking outside buttons in menu
  • In rare cases, audio feedback tangles up when entering "hole detection radius"
